sentence: Jim Lamon, a Republican Senate hopeful from the state of Arizona, is showing off a new ad that he says will air during the Super Bowl that features him firing a gun at a likenesses of President Joe Biden, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, and Sen. Mark Kelly (D-AZ).
author: Brad Reed
title: Arizona GOP candidate's Super Bowl ad features him firing a gun at likenesses of Biden and Pelosi

sentence: A GOP Senate candidate who was among the 11 Arizona Republicans who signed a forged electors document has released a violent campaign ad where he shoots at actors representing President Joe Biden, Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi, and Sen. Mark Kelly, whose wife—former Rep. Gabby Giffords—survived a brutal assassination attempt in 2011.
title: Arizona GOP candidate revels in outrage after releasing vile ad depicting political violence

sentence: In a new campaign ad, Arizona Republican Senate candidate Jim Lamon — appearing as an Old West-style sheriff — shoots at an actor playing his political opponent, incumbent Sen. Mark Kelly (D-AZ).
author: Josh Israel
title: Arizona GOP Candidate Posts Video Threatening To Shoot Democrats

sentence: Ducey’s decision not to join a crowded Republican primary field leaves state Attorney General Mark Brnovich as the favorite to face incumbent Democrat Mark Kelly in the November election.
author: Callie Patteson
title: Arizona GOP Gov. Ducey won’t run for Senate despite McConnell recruiting pitch

sentence: Vulnerable Democrat Sen. Mark Kelly (D-AZ) trails a generic Republican in Arizona’s Senate race, according to a poll from OHPredictive Insights released this past week.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Poll: Democrat Mark Kelly Trails Generic Republican in AZ Senate Race

sentence: He is running against several other Republicans for the nomination to take on Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly, including state Attorney General Mark Brnovich and businessman Jim Lamon.
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Pro-Trump Arizona candidate complains Biden's new rules wouldn't let him build his 'very cool' ghost gun
